attributes.action: Introduce a system of carbon rationing for every adult in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring forward legislation to introduce a carbon rationing system for the UK. Every adult would have a set ration (to be set initially at 3 tonnes per year).there would be a lower level for children. The system would hand responsibility and initiative over to citizens. Top down targets won't work.
